articles.author: Nithya P Nair
articles.title: Moto E40 Set to Launch in India Today: Expected Price, Specifications - Gadgets 360
articles.description: Moto E40 is set to launch in India today, October 12. The handset was unveiled in Europe last week. Here are all the details we know about the new Motorola smartphone, including the expected specifications and pricing details.
articles.content: Motorola Moto E40 will launch in India today, October 12, at 12pm (noon). The new Motorola phone is teased to sport a 90Hz display and an octa-core Unisoc T700 SoC, paired with 4GB of RAM and 64GB in… [+1982 chars]

articles.title: Astronaut's Photo Shows a Huge Blue Flash in Earth's Atmosphere - Gizmodo

articles.title: Under-pressure Taliban to meet EU, US in diplomatic push - NEWS.com.au
articles.description: The Taliban will hold joint face-to-face talks with European and US envoys, the EU said on Monday, as the hardline Islamists pursue their diplomatic push for international support.
articles.content: UN Secretary-General Antonio Guterres slams the Taliban's "broken" promises to Afghan women and girls, during a press conference on the situation in Afghanistan.The Taliban will hold joint face-to-fa… [+712 chars]

articles.title: Demand for fossil fuels has created price increases not seen in years - Sarasota Herald-Tribune
articles.description: European and Asian countries are competing to secure sufficient supplies of fossil fuels; the concern about climate has temporarily taken a back seat.
articles.content: The demand for natural gas,coal and oil has created price increases not seen for years, pushing electricity costs in Europe to all-time highs. The supply shortage has several causes, including supply… [+4256 chars]

articles.title: Four detained, including prime minister's nephew, during massive pro-EU protest in Poland - Independent.ie
articles.description: Police in Warsaw have said that four people, including the prime minister's nephew, were detained during a massive protest against government policy that critics say could cost Poland its European Union membership.
